LanguageData.MustBeUnderRoof: Must be placed under a roof.
LanguageData.MustBeNextToWall: Must be placed against a wall.
LanguageData.baseViewRangeDesc: Need save reload to take effect
LanguageData.buildingVisionMod: How far can vision providing building can see multiplier
LanguageData.buildingVisionModDesc: The preview range shown will not be accurate
LanguageData.animalVisionModDesc: How far can trained animal can see multiplier
LanguageData.turretVisionModDesc: How far can turret can see multiplier
LanguageData.NeedWatcherDesc: Camera building need someone to use the camera console to provide vision
LanguageData.wildLifeTabVisible: Wild animals in fog is still shown in wildlife tab
LanguageData.aiSmart: AI not affected much by fog of war
LanguageData.aiSmartDesc: AI not affected much by fog of war
LanguageData.hideSpeakBubble: Hide interaction bubble for enemy in fog of war.
LanguageData.hideSpeakBubbleDesc: Hide the bubble when you use the interaction bubble mod. Can cause lag. Will make UI crash when combined with speak up mod.
LanguageData.NoCameraConsole: The camera console isn't built or being used
LanguageData.mapRevealAtStart: Reveal map at start. Doesn't provide vision though
LanguageData.baseHearingRange: Base hearing range (pawn position hidden in FoW will be revealed if they are moving). Set to 0 to disable
LanguageData.censorMode: Hide that little 17x28 pixels image for the puritan
LanguageData.hideThreatSmall: Hide small threat event (ex: single manhunter animal)
LanguageData.prisonerGiveVision: Prisoner provide vision at reduced range
LanguageData.allyGiveVision: Ally provide vision at slightly reduced range
LanguageData.fogAlphaSetting_desc: Fog covering level for discovered but not currently seen places
LanguageData.fogFadeSpeedSetting_desc: Speed of the fog fade effect. Disable it could improve performances.
